title: Week 21 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 21st week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, October 11th, 2021. 

## ETHEREUM POOLS
•	Reduce UMA/USDC 50/50 to 250 BAL per week flexible BAL.
•	Reduce MATIC/WETH 50/50 to 400 BAL per week flexible BAL.
•	Reduce REN/WETH 50/50 to 400 BAL per week flexible BAL.
•	Remove COMP/WETH 50/50 from Tier 4, allocate 500 BAL per week from flexible BAL.
•	Allocate a Tier 4 slot to GRO/WETH 80/20. This pool will now receive 1,000 BAL per week.
•	Start dual incentives for UNN/WETH 80/20. 250 BAL per week flexible BAL, 375,000 UNN per week.
## POLYGON POOLS
•	Reduce USDC/WETH/BAL/WMATIC 25/25/25/25 to 6,000 BAL per week.
•	Reduce USDC/WETH/LINK/AAVE 20/20/20/20/20 to 4,000 BAL per week.
•	Reduce QI/WMATIC/USDC/MAI/BAL 20/20/20/20/20 to 0 BAL per week & 0 QI per week.
•	Increase QI/BAL 50/50 to 300 BAL per week & 15,000 QI per week.
•	Increase WBTC/WETH 50/50 to 1,750 BAL per week.
•	Increase USDC/WETH 50/50 to 1,750 BAL per week.
## ARBITRUM POOLS
•	Reduce DHT/WETH 80/20 to 100 BAL per week from flexible BAL.
•	Reduce GNO/WETH 80/20 to 250 BAL per week from flexible BAL.
•	Reduce LINK/WETH 80/20 to 650 BAL per week from flexible BAL.
•	Reduce COMP/WETH 80/20 to 700 BAL per week from flexible BAL.
•	Increase TCR/WETH 80/20 to 1,000 BAL per week from flexible BAL.

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/926
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
